attributes.action: UK to temporarily revert to being a monarchy until a decision is made on Brexit
attributes.background:
The government and opposition MPs have repeatedly shown themselves incapable of deciding on a course of action for the UK's exit from the EU.  They also refuse to refer the matter back to the public.

This leaves only one option for making this decision: temporarily hand control to the Queen.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition setting out what powers you would like the Government and Parliament to give to the Monarch.
